definitions.text: the sensation that results when olfactory receptors in the nose are stimulated by particular chemicals in gaseous form
examples: she loved the smell of roses

definitions.text: any property detected by the olfactory system
the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people
examples: the feel of the city excited him
a clergyman improved the tone of the meeting
it had the smell of treason

definitions.text: the faculty that enables us to distinguish scents
the act of perceiving the odor of something
inhale the odor of; perceive by the olfactory sense

examples: He rarely washes, and he smells

definitions.text: become aware of not through the senses but instinctively
